data.title: Cincinnati Reds Spring Training Broadcasts/Coverage
data.meta_description:

data.text:
Hey everyone, just a reminder that games start tomorrow.

If you're new to the site, we'll be running business as usual. We'll have game previews, game threads, and recaps for all of the spring games. Stop by and follow along with us.

How do I find Spring Training games?

If you're itching for baseball in March (like I am), it couldn't be easier to find Spring Training games. All but 4 games will be broadcast on over the air radio, and if you're local, it's easy to find the games on either 700 WLW or 1360 WSAI. The other ones will be on MLB.com, and you'll probably need a Gameday Audio subscription to get them. It'll cost you $19.99, but the subscription is good for radio coverage of every game for every team, online and on mobile. If you're like me and like to listen on your phone, it's worth it.

What about TV?

The Reds will have 7 games broadcast live on either FSOhio or MLB Network, and an additional 9 will be broadcast on delay on MLBN. All in all, there'll be plenty of opportunities to see these guys in action.

Where can I find the games?

Here's the schedule, from the Reds' website:

Tuesday, March 3 vs. Cleveland 3:05 PM MLBN (delay) WLW 700 Wednesday, March 4 @Cleveland 3:05 PM FS-O, MLBN (delay) WSAI-1360 Thursday, March 5 vs. Cleveland 3:05 PM FS-O, MLBN (delay) WSAI-1360 Friday, March 6 @Chi Cubs 3:05 PM WSAI-1360 Saturday, March 7 @Kansas City 3:05 PM WLW 700 Sunday, March 8 vs. Seattle 4:05 PM WLW 700 Monday, March 9 vs. LA Angels 4:05 PM MLBN (delay) WLW 700 Tuesday, March 10 @Milwaukee 4:05 PM MLBN (delay) WSAI-1360 Wednesday, March 11 vs. Kansas City 4:05 PM WSAI-1360 Thursday, March 12 @Arizona 4:10 PM MLB.com Friday, March 13 @LA Dodgers 10:05 PM MLBN (delay) MLB.com Saturday, March 14 vs. Colorado 4:05 PM WLW 700 Sunday, March 15 @Chi Cubs 4:05 PM MLBN (delay) WLW 700 Monday, March 16 vs. San Francisco 4:05 PM WLW 700 Tuesday, March 17 @Cleveland 4:05 PM FS-O WSAI-1360 Wednesday, March 18 vs. Chi White Sox 4:05 PM WSAI-1360 Thursday, March 19 vs. Texas 4:05 PM MLB.com Friday, March 20 @San Francisco 9:05 PM MLBN MLB.com Saturday, March 21 @Oakland 4:05 PM WLW 700 Sunday, March 22 vs. Oakland 4:05 PM WLW 700 Monday, March 23 @Texas 9:05 PM MLBN WLW 700 Wednesday, March 25 vs. Texas 10:05 PM MLBN (delay) WLW 700 Thursday, March 26 @Cleveland 4:05 PM FS-O WSAI-1360 Friday, March 27 vs. Milwaukee 10:05 PM WLW 700 Saturday, March 28 vs. Chi Cubs 4:05 PM WLW 700 Sunday, March 29 @LA Angels 3:10 PM MLBN (delay) WLW 700 Monday, March 30 vs. San Diego 4:05 PM WSAI-1360 Tuesday, March 31 @Milwaukee 4:05 PM MLBN (delay) WSAI-1360 Wednesday, April 1 vs. Arizona 4:05 PM WSAI-1360 Thursday, April 2 vs. Cleveland 3:05 PM WSAI-1360 Friday, April 3 @Toronto 7:07 PM MLBN (delay) WLW 700 Saturday, April 4 @Toronto 1:07 PM MLBN WLW 700

See you guys tomorrow!
